AWS no Canary releases for AWS lambda so for those that aren't familiar with
Canary releases is the concept by which you release your new version of the
application in this case a new version of lambda you point a small percentage of traffic to it real traffic coming
from users and you make validations and you test that the is actually behave incorrectly and if it is you can promote
the canary to receive a hundred percent of the traffic but if it isn't you can easily roll back now the good thing is
that san has integrated prepackaged canary releases for us that we can
